project.description: Brukes ved deploy av følgende domener: * pepgwsbs * partner-gw-pep-sbs * partner-gw-router-sbs * service-gw-pep-sbs * service-gw-router-sbs * service-gw-pep-fss * service-gw-router-fss * sts-sbs * sts-fss

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Applications
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Syntaks: Applikasjonsnavn:versjonsnummer F.eks. partner-gw-router-sbs:1.0.5 eller sts-sbs:0.0.2-SNAPSHOT

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: dpAliasesE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Hvilke bokser som skal bli deployet til

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: routerProvision
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Provisjonere kun router-domene? Kjøres automatisk hvis WSRR-tjenesteregister og service-gw provisjoneres (provision==true).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: pluginVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provisioning plugin version (for forsyning av service-gw 2.0 og oppdatering av router-domener)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
/var/lib/jenkins/scripts/cleanRepo3gen.sh
#Oppretter mappe for NFS logging og restarter NFS Serveren på Jenkins (kun for U!) #Må gjøres ofte siden Puppet overskriver endringene hver dag :'( sudo chown root:ci /etc/exports sudo chmod g+w /etc/exports app=$(echo $Applications | cut -d":" -f1) folder="/tmp/nfsshare/datapower/${Environment}_${app}" mkdir -p ${folder} echo "$folder 10.33.68.41(rw,sync,no_root_squash)" >> /etc/exports #Skjuler feilmeldinger pga. duplikatlinjer sudo service nfs restart 2> /dev/null

if [ $routerProvision == "true" ]; then
routerAppName=$(echo $Applications | cut -d":" -f1)
if [[ $routerAppName == *router* ]] then domainClassSuffix="-$(echo $Environment | head -c 1)" if [ $domainClassSuffix == "-p" -o $domainClassSuffix == "-P" ]; then domainClassSuffix="" fi if [ $routerAppName == "partner-gw-router-sbs" ]; then #dpDomainApplication="nhn-gw${domainClassSuffix}" dpDomainApplication="nhn-gw-t" elif [ $routerAppName == "service-gw-router-sbs" ]; then dpDomainApplication="${Environment}_service-gw-pep-sbs" elif [ $routerAppName == "service-gw-router-fss" ]; then dpDomainApplication="${Environment}_service-gw-pep-fss" fi echo "Provisioning $routerAppName with services from $dpDomainApplication"
cd ${WORKSPACE} && /usr/maven/latest/bin/mvn clean no.nav.maven.plugins:service-provisioning-maven-plugin:$pluginVersion:router-provision -e -B -U -DenvConfigUrlString=$EnvConfig -Denv=$Environment -Dusername=$USER -Dpassword=$Password -DdpAliases=$dpAliasesE -DrouterAppName=$routerAppName -DdpDomainApplications=$dpDomainApplication ### Upload service-registry if the outputfolder exists environmentUpperCase=`echo $Environment | awk '{print toupper($0)}'` registryDestinationFolder=/data/service-registry/$environmentUpperCase registrySourceFolder=${WORKSPACE}/target/output if [ -d "$registrySourceFolder" ]; then ssh test@example.com "mkdir -p $registryDestinationFolder" scp -r $registrySourceFolder/* test@example.com:$registryDestinationFolder fi fi fi

if [ $provision == "true" ]; then echo "Updating service registry file..." cd ${WORKSPACE} && /usr/maven/latest/bin/mvn clean no.nav.maven.plugins:service-provisioning-maven-plugin:${pluginVersion}:provision -e -B -DenvConfigUrlString=https://fasit.adeo.no/conf -Denv=$Environment -Dusername=$USER -Dpassword=$Password -DdpAliases=$dpAliasesE
environmentUpperCase=`echo $Environment | awk '{print toupper($0)}'` registryDestinationFolder=/data/service-registry/$environmentUpperCase registrySourceFolder=${WORKSPACE}/nav-init-pom/target/output xslReferenceString="<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href='../../service-registry-stylesheet_v2.xsl'?>" if [ -d "$registrySourceFolder" ]; then sed -i '1 s:$:'"$xslReferenceString"':' ${registrySourceFolder}/service-gw-2.0/*_service-registry.xml || true ssh test@example.com "mkdir -p $registryDestinationFolder" scp -r $registrySourceFolder/* test@example.com:$registryDestinationFolder fi fi
